law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 446, sec. 10, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 83, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 18, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 261, sec. 1.
